One slight problem with Slack is that I sometimes see that there was a new message (like in “All Threads”) but I couldn’t see which one. If ever someone feels I am ignoring them, it’s OK to ask again.
When there is unread message, slack will have a category named “unread”, and list all channels that have unread message, and it will disappear after you viewed all messages.
But some times, Slack could mistakenly show there is unread message, while actual not
